name: Help! I Accidentally Isekai'd Five Cute Girls And I'm Their Boss?
name_original: Help! I Accidentally Isekai'd Five Cute Girls And I'm Their Boss?
description:
In this game, you play as "MC," the main character in an isekai anime. Transported to another world, MC finds himself required to manage an idol group in order to survive. But the idols are taken from Earth as well, isekai'd just as he was.

Help! I Accidentally Isekai'd Five Cut Girls And I'm Their Boss was lovingly crafted in 2 weeks for the I Can't Write But Want To Tell A Story game jam in Summer 2020.

It was created in Ren'Py and developed entirely on stream.
